Command.label: Chat Command
Command.tooltip: Command chat uses to enter raffle

Permission.label: Permission To Enter
Permission.tooltip: Minimum user level to enter raffle

PermissionInfo.label: Permission Info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for selected permission (if applicable)

WinnerListKeyword.label: Winner List Keyword
WinnerListKeyword.tooltip: First parameter after `Command` above users enter to get list of recent winners.

WinnerListPermission.label: Winner List Permission
WinnerListPermission.tooltip: Minimum user level to list recent winners

WinnerListPermissionInfo.label: Winner List Permission Info
WinnerListPermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for selected permission (if applicable)

EntryCost.label: Cost Per Entry
EntryCost.tooltip: Amount of currency per entry to remove

MaxPersonalEntries.label: Maximum Entries
MaxPersonalEntries.tooltip: Maximum number of entries for self-entry, also maximum allowed to donate per-person

EnableDonations.label: Allow Donating Entries
EnableDonations.tooltip: Allow viewers to purchase entries for other viewers

AllowMultipleDonations.label: Allow Multiple Donations
AllowMultipleDonations.tooltip: Allow viewers to donate to multiple people

AnnounceWinnersIndividually.label: Announce Winners Individually
AnnounceWinnersIndividually.tooltip: Announce each winners in their own message in chat

RaffleTimerDuration.label: Raffle Entry Period
RaffleTimerDuration.tooltip: Number of seconds raffle entries will be allowed

IsCurrencyGiveaway.label: Give Currency As Prize?
IsCurrencyGiveaway.tooltip: Winners will automatically receive `Currency Giveaway Amount` as the reward

CurrencyGiveawayAmount.label: Currency Giveaway Amount
CurrencyGiveawayAmount.tooltip: Amount of currency to give to winners

Message_RaffleOpen.value: A raffle for: {0} has started! {1} can enter!
Message_RaffleOpen.label: Raffle Open
Message_RaffleOpen.tooltip: Message announcing an open raffle in chat

Message_RaffleOpenUnlimitedEntry.label: Raffle Open (Unlimited Entries)
Message_RaffleOpenUnlimitedEntry.tooltip: Message announcing an open raffle, with unlimited entries, in chat

Message_RaffleOpenLimitedEntry.value: Entry Cost: {0} - Maximum Entries: {1} - Use `{2} <number>` to enter
Message_RaffleOpenLimitedEntry.label: Raffle Open (with Max Entries)
Message_RaffleOpenLimitedEntry.tooltip: Message announcing an open raffle, with maximum entries, in chat

Message_RaffleOpenDonateEntry.value: or `{0} <number> <username>` to donate entries to someone.
Message_RaffleOpenDonateEntry.label: Donate Entries
Message_RaffleOpenDonateEntry.tooltip: Included with raffle open message: instructions on how to donate entries

Message_RaffleClosed.value: Entries have stopped for the raffle! You can no longer enter!
Message_RaffleClosed.label: Raffle Closed
Message_RaffleClosed.tooltip: Message announcing closing of a raffle

Message_RaffleRefunded.value: All {0} has been refunded for the current raffle.
Message_RaffleRefunded.label: Raffle Refunded
Message_RaffleRefunded.tooltip: Message announcing refund of a raffle

Message_Winner.value: @{0}, you have won! Speak up in chat!
Message_Winner.label: Raffle Winner Notification
Message_Winner.tooltip: Message to announce winner in chat

Message_MultipleWinners.value: {0} you have all won! Please speak up in chat!
Message_MultipleWinners.label: Multiple Winner Notification
Message_MultipleWinners.tooltip: Message to announce multiple winners in one chat message

Message_NotEnoughCurrency.label: Not Enough Currency
Message_NotEnoughCurrency.tooltip: Response to user(s) when they don't have enough currency to purchase the number of entries

Message_MaxEntriesExceeded.value: @{0} You are only able to purchase up to {1} entries.
Message_MaxEntriesExceeded.label: Maximum Entries Response
Message_MaxEntriesExceeded.tooltip: Response message if user tries to purchase too many entries

Message_MultipleDonationsDisabled.value: @{0}, you can only donate entries to one person.
Message_MultipleDonationsDisabled.label: Multiple Donations Disabled
Message_MultipleDonationsDisabled.tooltip: Response to send when user tries to donate to more than one person and 'Allow Multiple Donations' is disabled

Message_DonationsDisabled.label: Entry Donations Disabled
Message_DonationsDisabled.tooltip: Message explaining that donations are not enabled for this raffle.

Message_DonateToSelfDisallowed.value: You cannot donate entires to yourself.
Message_DonateToSelfDisallowed.label: Can Not Donate To Self Notification
Message_DonateToSelfDisallowed.tooltip: Message explaining that you can not donate entries to yourself

Message_CloseBeforeChoosing.value: You must close the raffle before choosing winners.
Message_CloseBeforeChoosing.label: Close Raffle Before Picking Winners Notification
Message_CloseBeforeChoosing.tooltip: Message explaining that the raffle needs to be closed before choosing winners

Message_NoEntrantsFound.value: There are no entrants to choose from.
Message_NoEntrantsFound.label: No Entrants Notification
Message_NoEntrantsFound.tooltip: No raffle entries to choose from message

Message_WinnerListing.value: @{0}, the winners of the last raffle were: {1}
Message_WinnerListing.label: Recent Winner Listing
Message_WinnerListing.tooltip: Message to send when recent winner list is requested.

Manage_Command.label: Raffle Management Command
Manage_Command.tooltip: Command used to manage a raffle

Manage_Permission.label: Management Permission Level
Manage_Permission.tooltip: Minimum user level to allow management

Manage_PermissionInfo.label: Management Permission Info
Manage_PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for management permission

Manage_ClearWinnersKeyword.label: Keyword To Clear Recent Winners
Manage_ClearWinnersKeyword.tooltip: Keyword used to clear recent raffle winners (to create a 'second' winner list

Manage_CloseKeyword.label: Keyword To Close Raffle
Manage_CloseKeyword.tooltip: Keyword used to stop a raffle

Manage_OpenKeyword.label: Keyword To Open Raffle
Manage_OpenKeyword.tooltip: Keyword used to start a raffle

Manage_RefundKeyword.label: Keyword To Refund Raffle
Manage_RefundKeyword.tooltip: Keyword used to refund a raffle

Manage_ResetKeyword.label: Keyword To Reset Raffle
Manage_ResetKeyword.tooltip: Keyword used to reset a raffle

Manage_SaveSnapshotKeyword.label: Keyword To Snapshot Raffle
Manage_SaveSnapshotKeyword.tooltip: Keyword used to save a raffle snapshot

Manage_LoadSnapshotKeyword.label: Keyword To Load A Raffle
Manage_LoadSnapshotKeyword.tooltip: Keyword used to load a raffle snapshot

Button_ClearRaffleWinners.label: Clear Winners List
Button_ClearRaffleWinners.tooltip: Clear existing winners to pick secondary list
